jobsJson.descriptionPlain: To enlarge marketing intelligent team capability to work of data analytics, or basically to be able to handle more data analytics project
jobsJson.description: To enlarge marketing intelligent team capability to work of data analytics, or basically to be able to handle more data analytics project
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
jobsJson.additional:

lists.content:
• Bachelor degree in Business, Computer science, relevant major or relevant experience.
  • Expert in SQL & data Visualization tool
  • Experience in crafting marketing and business report
  • Excellent MS PowerPoint & Excel skills
  • Strong analytical skill & thinking
  • Systematic and logical approach to problem-solving, pragmatic in working around problems
  • Good time-management skills, with adaptability to meet tight deadlines and balance simultaneous work streams
